DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY : TRADE
DOC.TEXT: Swiss Ban Foreign Trucks : In a referendum , 52 % of the voters approved a proposal to force all truck trailers crossing Switzerland between northern and southern Europe to be shipped by railroad within 10 years . Trucks carrying goods to or from Switzerland and domestic traffic will be exempt . The outcome was a stinging rebuke to the four-party governing coalition , which had argued the ban would violate international transport treaties and " provoke politically and economically harmful retaliation from abroad. "
